## MemPool.insert() method

Inserts given block into list of free blocks, sorted by address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected insert(block: number): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
